discover.instruction: Read these formal and literary examples. Notice the subjunctive forms.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай эти формальные и литературные примеры. Обрати внимание на формы сослагательного наклонения.

content.text: The committee <highlight>demands that he resign</highlight> immediately. It is essential <highlight>that every member be</highlight> present. I suggest <highlight>that she reconsider</highlight> her position. <highlight>Be that as it may</highlight>, we must proceed. <highlight>Far be it from me</highlight> to criticize. <highlight>If need be</highlight>, we shall take action. The law requires <highlight>that the accused be</highlight> informed. It is vital <highlight>that this remain</highlight> confidential. <highlight>Suffice it to say</highlight>, the situation is serious. <highlight>Long live</highlight> the spirit of inquiry!
content.question: How does the subjunctive differ from normal verb forms?
content.question_ru: Чем сослагательное наклонение отличается от обычных форм глагола?

points.rule: Mandative subjunctive: demand/insist/require/suggest + that + base verb
points.rule_ru: Мандативное сослагательное: demand/insist/require/suggest + that + базовый глагол
points.example: I insist that he leave. They demanded that she be present.

points.rule: After adjectives: essential/vital/necessary/important + that + base verb
points.rule_ru: После прилагательных: essential/vital/necessary/important + that + базовый глагол
points.example: It is essential that everyone attend. It's vital that he understand.

points.rule: Fixed expressions: Be that as it may, Far be it from me, If need be, Suffice it to say
points.rule_ru: Устойчивые выражения: Be that as it may, Far be it from me, If need be, Suffice it to say
points.example: Far be it from me to judge. Be that as it may, we continue.

points.rule: Formulaic wishes: Long live..., God bless..., Heaven forbid...
points.rule_ru: Формульные пожелания: Long live..., God bless..., Heaven forbid...
points.example: Long live the king! Heaven forbid that should happen.

points.rule: Were for all persons in hypotheticals: If I/he/she/it were
points.rule_ru: Were для всех лиц в гипотетических: If I/he/she/it were
points.example: If she were here, she would agree. I wish it were possible.

comparison_table.example: She suggested that I be early.

notice.instruction: Identify subjunctive forms and their triggers.
notice.instruction_ru: Определи формы сослагательного наклонения и их триггеры.

tasks.text:
Formal documents:

1. The board recommends that the CEO step down.
2. It is imperative that all documents be submitted by Friday.
3. The regulation requires that each applicant provide two references.
4. Be that as it may, the deadline cannot be extended.
5. The judge ordered that the witness be protected.
6. It is crucial that this information remain confidential.
7. Far be it from me to question your expertise.
8. The treaty demands that all parties cease hostilities.
9. If need be, emergency measures will be implemented.
10. It was proposed that a new committee be established.

notice.reflection_question_ru: Почему сослагательное наклонение более распространено в американском формальном английском, чем в британском?

produce.instruction: Write a formal proposal or legal/academic text using subjunctive structures.
produce.instruction_ru: Напиши формальное предложение или юридический/академический текст, используя структуры сослагательного наклонения.
prompts: Draft requirements for a new regulation
Compose a formal resolution or motion
produce.example: The committee recommends that the following measures be implemented without delay. It is essential that each department head attend the mandatory briefing. We insist that all stakeholders be given adequate notice. Far be it from me to question existing procedures, but it is vital that reforms take place. Be that as it may, the current system cannot continue. We propose that a task force be established to oversee the transition. If need be, additional resources will be allocated. It is imperative that this matter remain a priority. Heaven forbid that we should fail in our obligations to the community.
criteria: Uses mandative subjunctive (demand/insist/require that + base verb)
Uses adjective + that (essential/vital/important that + base verb)

texts.title: Board Resolution
texts.content: The Board of Directors hereby resolves that the merger be approved. It is essential that shareholders be informed within 48 hours. We demand that all parties maintain confidentiality. It is crucial that the transition proceed smoothly. The resolution requires that the CEO present quarterly updates. Far be it from us to override management, but it is vital that oversight be strengthened. If need be, extraordinary measures will be taken. Be that as it may, shareholder value remains paramount.

texts.title: Academic Policy
texts.content: The faculty senate recommends that the new curriculum be adopted. It is imperative that each student complete the prerequisite courses. We suggest that advisors meet with students regularly. It is essential that academic standards be maintained. The policy requires that all theses be submitted electronically. Suffice it to say, these changes are necessary. It is vital that faculty receive adequate training. Heaven forbid that educational quality should decline. We insist that resources be allocated accordingly.

texts.title: Legal Document
texts.content: The court orders that the defendant appear at the scheduled hearing. It is essential that all evidence be preserved. The prosecution demands that the witness be made available. It is vital that due process be followed. The ruling requires that both parties submit briefs. Be that as it may, the proceedings must continue. It is crucial that confidentiality be maintained. If need be, protective orders will be issued. Far be it from this court to prejudge the outcome.

texts.title: Diplomatic Communication
texts.content: Our government insists that diplomatic channels remain open. It is essential that all parties exercise restraint. We propose that negotiations resume immediately. It is vital that humanitarian aid be permitted. The agreement requires that both sides cease hostilities. Far be it from us to interfere in internal affairs, but it is imperative that civilian lives be protected. If need be, peacekeeping forces will be deployed. Long live international cooperation. Be that as it may, sovereignty must be respected.

texts.title: Medical Protocol
texts.content: The ethics committee recommends that informed consent be obtained. It is essential that patient confidentiality be protected. The protocol requires that all adverse events be reported. It is vital that proper procedures be followed. We suggest that additional safeguards be implemented. Heaven forbid that patient safety should be compromised. It is crucial that the research team receive training. Far be it from us to impede scientific progress. If need be, the study will be suspended. Be that as it may, ethical standards remain non-negotiable.
